text: Location of Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region. Roškovce is a village and municipality in the Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region of far north-eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1478. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 339 metres and covers an area of 12.548 km². It has a population of about 215 people. ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20071116010355/http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Medzilaborce District
title: Roškovce
